channel.title: How do i put my client in a file sharer website
channel.description: well, i coded a client for my server but i dont know how to put it up on fileshare,uppit, or mega upload. please help asap?

item.title: How do i put my client in a file sharer website
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

Nah… you got it all wrong mates this is how you zip a folder

right click the folder, select send to. click on compressed

now wait for winrar to do its thing. and send the winrar file. the people that download it, will extract to to desktop.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i put my client in a file sharer website

item.title: How do i put my client in a file sharer website
item.dc:creator: @ibronze ibronze
item.description:
@ibronze wrote:

[quote=“Motokid126, post:5, topic:341060”]Alright, what you do is…

Go to google, and download “winrar” once you haev downloaded winrar then install it… After you do so right click on your folder for your server/client whatever. Click “add to archive” Then it’ll ask if y ou want to .zip or .rar it. Once you do that then it’ll do that for you. Then go to uppit, mediafire, or whatever site y our uploading it to, click browse on the file upload thing, choose your .rar or .zip file and it’ll upload and there you have it!!

Good luck. If you have any problems just ask.[/quote] were do i find “add to arhive…”

Read full topic

item.title: How do i put my client in a file sharer website
item.dc:creator: @Motokid126 Motokid126
item.description:
@Motokid126 wrote:

Alright, what you do is…

Go to google, and download “winrar” once you haev downloaded winrar then install it… After you do so right click on your folder for your server/client whatever. Click “add to archive” Then it’ll ask if y ou want to .zip or .rar it. Once you do that then it’ll do that for you. Then go to uppit, mediafire, or whatever site y our uploading it to, click browse on the file upload thing, choose your .rar or .zip file and it’ll upload and there you have it!!

Good luck. If you have any problems just ask.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

you need winzip although i recommend winrar because winzip can’t open .rar files (or can it?) and that’s the format most files are on the internet.
